events.message: I recently received my order, but I want to request a refund because the product did not meet my expectations.
The customer's request includes keywords related to refund, so the case is categorized under Refund.
Assigning the case to refund department agent John Smith for further assistance.
Hello! Thank you for contacting support. I understand you want to request a refund, and I'm here to help.
Could you please provide your order number and the reason why you wish to return the product?
My order number is 123456789, and the product arrived in poor condition and did not match the description online.
We can process a full refund upon receiving the returned product. I will send you a prepaid shipping label shortly.
Thank you for the quick response and the refund process details. I appreciate your help.
The refund request has been opened and the prepaid label sent. Please return the product at your earliest convenience.
Just checking in to confirm you have received the shipping label and to see if you need further assistance with the return.
Yes, I got the label and shipped the package yesterday. Thanks again for the smooth process.
We have received the returned product and completed your refund. Closing the case now. Thank you for your patience.
